verses.verse: O <S%G5599><s%> <S%G453>foolish<s%> <S%G1052>Galatians<s%>, <S%G5101>who<s%> did <S%G940>bewitch<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2596>before<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> was openly set <S%G4270>forth<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%>?

This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> I <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>. Received <S%G2983>ye<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G189>hearing<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>?
Are <S%G2075>ye<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G453>foolish<s%>? having <S%G1728>begun<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, are <S%G2005>ye<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2005>perfected<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>?
Did ye <S%G3958>suffer<s%> so many <S%G5118>things<s%> in <S%G1500>vain<s%>? <S%G1489>if<s%> it be <S%G2532>indeed<s%> in <S%G1500>vain<s%>.

He <S%G2023><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2023>supplieth<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, doeth he it <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G189>hearing<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>?
Even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> it was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.

Know <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> sons <S%G5207>of<s%> <S%G1097>Abraham<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%>, <S%G4275>foreseeing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G1344>justify<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, preached the <S%G4283>gospel<s%> beforehand unto <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G3754>saying<s%>, <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2127>shall<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> be <S%G2127>blessed<s%>.
So <S%G5620>then<s%> <S%G2127>they<s%> that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> are <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G2671>curse<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G1944>Cursed<s%> is every <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1696>continueth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, is <S%G1212>evident<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%>, The <S%G1342>righteous<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%>, <S%G444>He<s%> that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G1805>redeemed<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2671>curse<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, having <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G2671>curse<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G1944>Cursed<s%> is every <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2910>hangeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G3586>tree<s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might <S%G1096>come<s%> the <S%G2129>blessing<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> we might <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, I <S%G3004>speak<s%> after the manner <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>: <S%G3676>Though<s%> it be <S%G3676>but<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>'s <S%G1242>covenant<s%>, yet when it hath been <S%G2964>confirmed<s%>, no <S%G3762>one<s%> maketh it <S%G114>void<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> addeth <S%G1928>thereto<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G4483>were<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> <S%G4483>spoken<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%>. He <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G4690>seeds<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4690>to<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>: A <S%G1242>covenant<s%> confirmed <S%G4300>beforehand<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, 1519, 5547 the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> four <S%G5071>hundred<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%>, doth <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>disannul<s%>, so as <S%G3588>to<s%> <S%G2673>make<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of none <S%G2673>effect<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> is <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, it is no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G5483>granted<s%> it to <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is the <S%G3551>law<s%>? It was <S%G4369>added<s%> <S%G5484>because<s%> of <S%G3847>transgressions<s%>, till891, 3739 the <S%G4690>seed<s%> should <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the promise hath been <S%G1861>made<s%>; and it was <S%G1299>ordained<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of a <S%G3316>mediator<s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> a <S%G3316>mediator<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a mediator of <S%G1520>one<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>.

Is the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%> of <S%G3361>God<s%>? God <S%G1096>forbid<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there had <S%G1325>been<s%> a <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> could <S%G1410>make<s%> <S%G2227>alive<s%>, verily3689, Leviticus2 <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> would have <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> shut <S%G4788>up<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> might be <S%G1325>given<s%> to them <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%>, we were <S%G5432>kept<s%> in ward <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, shut <S%G4788>up<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> should <S%G3195>afterwards<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%>.

So <S%G5620><s%> that the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3807>tutor<s%> to bring us <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%>, we <S%G2070>are<s%> no <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G3807>tutor<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> of <S%G907>you<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> did put <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

There can <S%G1762>be<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1672>Greek<s%>, there can <S%G1762>be<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G1401>bond<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%>, there can <S%G1762>be<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G730>male<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2338>female<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> man <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s, <S%G686>then<s%> are <S%G2075>ye<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>'s <S%G4690>seed<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%>.
